comment: Don't know if someone has already done this , but when I saw Agolf Twitler , AKA 's " grand " entrance yesterday , this is the music that played in my head . Sound up . <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Don't know if someone has already done this , but when I saw Agolf Twitler , AKA 's " grand " entrance yesterday , this is the music that played in my head . Sound up . <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (k / know-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (ii / i
                        :part (h / head))
                  :ARG1 (d / do-02
                        :ARG0 (s / someone)
                        :ARG1 (t / this)
                        :time (a / already)))
            :ARG2 (p / play-11
                  :ARG1 (m2 / music
                        :mod (t2 / this))
                  :location h
                  :time (s2 / see-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (e / enter-01
                              :ARG0 (p2 / person
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Agolf"
                                          :op2 "Twitler"))
                              :ARG1 (e2 / entrance
                                    :mod (g / grand)
                                    :poss (o / organization
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "AKA")))
                              :time (y / yesterday)))))
      :snt2 (s3 / sound-up-04
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)))

comment: An entrance befitting the greatest president we've had since FDR . He has tackled issues no other pol has been willing to touch for years and collect wins at every turn . Loved this entrance ! !
amr:
# ::snt An entrance befitting the greatest president we've had since FDR . He has tackled issues no other pol has been willing to touch for years and collect wins at every turn . Loved this entrance ! !
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / befit-01
            :ARG1 (e / entrance)
            :ARG2 (p / president
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG2 (g / great)
                        :ARG3 (m2 / most)
                        :ARG5 (p2 / president
                              :ARG1-of (h2 / have-03
                                    :ARG0 (w / we)
                                    :time (s / since
                                          :op1 (p3 / person
                                                :name (n / name
                                                      :op1 "FDR"))))))))
      :snt2 (t / tackle-01
            :ARG0 (h3 / he)
            :ARG1 (ii / issue-02
                  :ARG1-of (t2 / touch-01
                        :ARG0 (p4 / pol
                              :mod (o / other))
                        :ARG1-of (w2 / will-02
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG0 p4
                              :duration (m3 / multiple
                                    :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                                          :quant 1
                                          :unit (y / year))))
                        :purpose (c / collect-01
                              :ARG0 p4
                              :ARG1 (w3 / win)
                              :location (t4 / turn-01
                                    :mod (e2 / every))))))
      :snt3 (l / love-01
            :mode expressive
            :ARG1 (e3 / enter-01
                  :mod (t5 / this))))
